APP.TITLE: RQTimer - mob timer for Royal Quest
APP.DESCRIPTION: RQTimer offers a convenient interface for tracking mobs both for solo players and for groups

MODAL.SERVER_CRASH_MESSAGE:
Are you sure you want to reset all respawns due to the server crash?
- Boss respawns will be rolled back by 5 minutes
- Elite respawns will be rolled back by 18 seconds
MODAL.LOGOUT_MESSAGE: Are you sure you want to log out?

MESSAGE.RESPAWNS_WITH_SERVER_CRASH: Respawns now account for server crash

MODAL.SELECT_EXACT_DEATH_TIME: Select the exact time of death:
MODAL.ENTER_CD_COUNT: Enter how many times based on cooldown:
MODAL.DELETE_MESSAGE: Are you sure you want to delete {{mobName}}?
MODAL.DEATH_TIME_OVERWRITE_1: {{mobName}} respawned at {{respTime}}. Are you sure you want to overwrite the death time with {{currentTime}}?
MODAL.DEATH_TIME_OVERWRITE_2: {{mobName}} will respawn at {{respTime}}. Are you sure you want to overwrite the death time with {{currentTime}}?
MODAL.RESPAWN_TIME_OVERWRITE_1: {{mobName}} has already respawned at {{respTime}}. Are you sure you want to overwrite the respawn time with {{currentTime}}?
MODAL.RESPAWN_TIME_OVERWRITE_2: {{mobName}} has already respawned at {{respTime}} and the next respawn is expected at {{nestRespTime}}. Are you sure you want to overwrite the respawn time with {{currentTime}}?
MODAL.NEXT_RESPAWN_TIME_OVERWRITE: The next respawn of {{mobName}} will be at {{respTime}}. Are you sure you want to overwrite the respawn time with {{currentTime}}?
MODAL.RESPAWN_TIME_NEXT_PROTECTED: A next respawn time is already set for {{mobName}} — {{respTime}}. Are you sure you want to overwrite it with {{currentTime}}?

TOUR.TIMER_MESSAGE: Zhevtie here! Let me show you the main functionality of the timer!
TOUR.SERVER_MESSAGE: Here you can select a server. Each server has its own timer, so don’t mix them up.
TOUR.TIMER_ITEM_MESSAGE: Each mob is shown as a panel with many buttons. Yes, there are many buttons, but we’ll figure them out.
TOUR.REWRITE_MESSAGE:
This button allows you to rewrite a mob in 3 ways:
1) By exact time of death
2) By exact respawn time
3) By number of cooldowns
TOUR.DIE_NOW_MESSAGE: This button lets you rewrite the mob right after death. I’ve also accounted for the average time to open the browser and press the button, which is about ~10 sec.
TOUR.MOB_HISTORY_MESSAGE: Here you can view the rewrite history of a specific mob: who rewrote it, how, and what the before and after times were.
TOUR.PLUS_COOLDOWN_MESSAGE:
Say I won’t make it before the mob respawns — this button lets me get the next cooldown respawn time for planning.

Note: This button only simulates a respawn, only you can see this time.
TOUR.COOLDOWN_MESSAGE: This button actually rewrites and displays the cooldown respawn for all group members.
TOUR.LOST_COOLDOWN_MESSAGE: Obvious one — if you lost track of the respawn and don’t know the time, click this to reset all timers for this mob.
TOUR.ADD_MESSAGE: This button does the opposite — it adds a mob to the group
TOUR.TIMER_SETTINGS_MESSAGE: Uhh, not much to say — the name says it all :D
TOUR.HEADER_MESSAGE: Alright, done with the timer buttons, now let’s look at header functions
TOUR.COPY_MESSAGE: Copies all respawns from the timer, except lost ones
TOUR.CONNECTION_MESSAGE:
If the game server crashes, press this button to adjust for rollback. It also shows status:
1) Online - green
2) Offline - red
TOUR.HISTORY_MESSAGE: This button shows the full rewrite history of all mobs
TOUR.SETTINGS_MESSAGE: Here you can configure mob display or change your password
TOUR.LOGOUT_MESSAGE: Log out and back in properly, got it?
TOUR.NOTIFICATION_MESSAGE: Here you can see current notifications from us, the devs
TOUR.TELEGRAM_BOT_MESSAGE: By popular demand, we added a Telegram bot that will send you rewritten respawns

MESSAGE.TIME_DESYNC_WARNING: The time on your device differs from the server time by {{seconds}} seconds. Please check your device's time settings.
MESSAGE.RESP_UPDATED_BY_DEATH: Respawn time was successfully updated by exact death time
MESSAGE.RESP_UPDATED_BY_RESPAWN: Respawn time was successfully updated by exact respawn time
MESSAGE.RESP_UPDATED_BY_CD: Respawn was successfully updated by cooldown {{cooldown}} time(s)
MESSAGE.RESP_REWRITTEN_BY_CD: Respawn was successfully rewritten by cooldown

NOTIFICATIONS.MOB_RESPAWN_SOON: {{mobName}} will respawn in less than {{minute}} minute(s).
NOTIFICATIONS.MOB_ENCOURAGEMENT: A rat is lurking, and it won't squash itself...

VALIDATIONS.EMAIL_OR_NICKNAME_REQUIRED: • Please enter your email or username!
VALIDATIONS.PASSWORD_MISS_NUMBER: • Password must contain at least one number!
VALIDATIONS.PASSWORD_MISS_UPPER_LATIN: • Password must contain at least one uppercase Latin letter!
VALIDATIONS.PASSWORD_MISS_LOWER_LATIN: • Password must contain at least one lowercase Latin letter!
VALIDATIONS.NICKNAME_MAX_UPPER: • Nickname can contain no more than 2 uppercase letters!
VALIDATIONS.NICKNAME_NO_SPECIAL_CHARS: • Nickname must not contain special characters!
VALIDATIONS.NICKNAME_NO_HYPHEN_START_END: • Nickname must not start or end with a hyphen!
VALIDATIONS.NICKNAME_MAX_ONE_HYPHEN: • Nickname can contain no more than one hyphen!
VALIDATIONS.NICKNAME_NO_MIXED_SCRIPTS: • Nickname cannot mix Cyrillic and Latin characters!
